effect: Increases the power of moves that match the user's type from the usual STAB multiplier of 1.5x to 2x.
synergies: High base power moves of the user's type
Pokémon with dual-typing to exploit multiple STAB types
Choice items to maximize damage output
notes: Particularly effective on Pokémon like Mega Lucario or Crawdaunt, turning their STAB moves into devastating attacks.
